system.description:
Effect: The user auto-succeeds on a Grapple Maneuver check against the target if Wrap hits. The Target becomes Bound 5. While the target is Bound, they lose -1 DEF and SPDEF stages for 5 activations at the end of each of their activations.

If either the Grappled or Bound condition ends, the target loses the other condition.
